channel.itunes:summary: Weekly podcast for Citroen 2cv enthusiasts, straight from 2cvimports, the #1 importer of Citroen 2cv's in the USA. If you're looking for your very own 2cv in the US or Canada, be sure to visit www.2cvimports.com, or email me directly at 2cvimports@gmail.com.

item.title: 2cvimports - Episode 3 - Basic Maintenance
item.description: This is the third edition of the 2cvimports podcast, covering basic maintenance to keep your 2cv in tip top shape.
